message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thanks for offering, Alice! That's a bit steep for me though. Would you consider $80?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $90, and that's as low as I can go. It's still a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice. How about we split the difference and do $85? That's a fair deal for both of us.

I see you're trying to make a deal, Bob! I appreciate the effort, but I'm not quite ready to give in yet. I can do $87, and that's as close as I'm willing to get. It's still a great deal for me, and I think you'll find it's worth it!
